template.name: Template App Oracle Database
template.description: Template for Oracle database monitoring end-point It used for monitoring from Management host with installed Zabbix agent Instance name has to be updated in MACROS section

trigger_prototype.name: PDB {$PDB_NAME} is in invalid state ({ITEM.VALUE1})
trigger_prototype.description: PDB is not in READ/WRITE mode

discovery_rule.name: PDBs tablespaces
discovery_rule.description: List all tablespaces for all tablespaces

trigger_prototype.name: Used more than {$TBS_HIGH}%( {ITEM.VALUE1}) of available space on {#TABLESPACE_NAME}, PDB {#PDB_NAME}
Used more than {$TBS_WARNING}%({ITEM.VALUE1}) of available space on {#TABLESPACE_NAME}, PDB {#PDB_NAME}
Used more than {$TBS_HIGH}%( {ITEM.VALUE1}) of available space on {#TABLESPACE_NAME}
Used more than {$TBS_WARNING}%({ITEM.VALUE1}) of available space on {#TABLESPACE_NAME}

trigger.name: Amount of processes exceeded treahold {$PROCESSES_HIGH} % ({ITEM.VALUE1})
trigger.description: Amount of current processes exceeded threshold

trigger.name: FRA used space exceeded {$FRA_HIGH} % ({ITEM.VALUE1})
trigger.description: FRA used space exceeded HIGH threshold

trigger.name: FRA used space exceeded {$FRA_WARNING} % ({ITEM.VALUE1})
trigger.description: FRA used space exceeded WARNING threshold
